Module COMP2013.coursework

Package code.GameplayElements

package code.GameplayElements
Model for all the objects that make up the game. This contains all the data stored for the ball, paddle and wall. Also has the levels, themes and an interface to interact with all the gameplay elements
Author:
Jordan Lovett
